original_text: And he will take the tenth of your seed, and of your vineyards, and give to his officers, and to his servants.
korean_text: 그가 또 너희의 곡식과 포도원 소산의 십일조를 거두어 자기의 관리와 신하에게 줄 것이며

sentences.original_text: And he will take the tenth of your seed
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너의 씨의 십일조를 취할 것이며
